title: I made a drawing for 27 rp, rito pls pls pls
body:
I am in dire need of 27 rp to gift my good friend Blood Moon Jhin. I thought there would be a sale for the skin which didnt really happen? Or I must have missed it like a r%%%%%. Luckily for me I drew the champion in question, {{champion:202}} , because I was paranoid about not having enough rp. I wasnt able to just drag the picture into this post which made me make a deviantart account just for this, so Riot could you please give my restless soul enough rp to gift my good ol' buddy o pal pls? :)

http://assbacca.deviantart.com/art/Jhin-Uncoloured-662750619    http://assbacca.deviantart.com/art/Jhin-Coloured-662752718

replies.body: Bro you have skills! Nice drawing there!

That is a glorious work of art.  :)  Thanks for sharing it with us.  Maybe we can work something in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) !  Our queue isn't very long right now so we'll reply back as soon as we can!

aww thanks dude :D

I'm hyped up for my buddy right now
Damn, those are really good drawings. Nice job sir.
